PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08462018-06-21ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding a Toxic Substance to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder Adding a TOXIC SUBSTANCE TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 in order to enable the Government to take risk management measures for toxic substances under the CEPA to manage environmental risks associated with triclosan.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0130 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
